Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Die Geschöpfe des Prometheus, op. 43

1801 · Hess 90 · Biamonti 289

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 58'

  • 1. Overtura: Adagio – Allegro molto con brio
  • 2. La Tempesta: Allegro non troppo
  • 3. (1.) Poco adagio – Allegro con brio
  • 4. (2.) Adagio – Allegro con brio
  • 5. (3.) Allegro vivace
  • 6. (4.) Maestoso – Andante
  • 7. (5.) Adagio – Andante quasi allegretto
  • 8. (6.) Un poco adagio – Allegretto
  • 9. (7.) Grave
  • 10. (8.) Allegro con brio
  • 11. (9.) Adagio – Allegro molto
  • 12. (10.) Pastorale: Allegro
  • 13. (11.) Coro di Gioja: Andante
  • 14. (12.) Solo di Gioja: Maestoso – Adagio – Allegro
  • 15. (13.) Terzettino, Grotteschi: Allegro
  • 16. (14.) Solo della Signora Cassentini: Andante – Adagio – Allegro – Allegretto
  • 17. (15.) Coro e Solo di Viganò: Andantino – Adagio – Allegro
  • 18. (16.) Finale: Allegretto – Allegro molto

This is a piano version of the orchestral ballet.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/8 [in preparation]
  • Breitkopf & Härtel · Supplemente zur Gesamtausgabe VIII / Original-Klavierauszüge eigener Werke · ed. Willy Hess

1. Overtura: Adagio – Allegro molto con brio

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. La Tempesta: Allegro non troppo

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. (1.) Poco adagio – Allegro con brio

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

4. (2.) Adagio – Allegro con brio

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3

5. (3.) Allegro vivace

This section is the end of the first act.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

6. (4.) Maestoso – Andante

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

7. (5.) Adagio – Andante quasi allegretto

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3

8. (6.) Un poco adagio – Allegretto

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

9. (7.) Grave

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3

10. (8.) Allegro con brio

Duration: 7'

Difficulty: 3

11. (9.) Adagio – Allegro molto

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

12. (10.) Pastorale: Allegro

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

13. (11.) Coro di Gioja: Andante

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

14. (12.) Solo di Gioja: Maestoso – Adagio – Allegro

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

15. (13.) Terzettino, Grotteschi: Allegro

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

16. (14.) Solo della Signora Cassentini: Andante – Adagio – Allegro – Allegretto

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

17. (15.) Coro e Solo di Viganò: Andantino – Adagio – Allegro

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3

18. (16.) Finale: Allegretto – Allegro molto

This section is the end of the second act. Beethoven used the same theme in the variations and fugue in E-flat major, op. 35, a contredanse for orchestra (WoO 14 no. 7), and the finale of the symphony no. 3 (op. 55).

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 3
